body: Thanks Abraham... I updated my HB & LB to the last version, but i get this error for running energy simulation: 1. Solution exception:global name 'HBGenerators_' is not defined as picture [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/EmXvm3BJSF-mTykqXWXD7VkonLSO3rB-XCjYzKo3lOy7DMedJPCob*Wz701-LP9YoWgBHARBTd0sQVrr5h*bVxR1bQNU7Npz/Untitled1.jpg) I followed the discussion "http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/1-solution-exception-global-name-hbgenerators-is-not-defined" but couldn't fix my problem.
